verses.content: Chun, hnuoia mi po po chu ṭawng hmunkhat le thu hril dân hmunkhat an ni vawng a.
Chun, hieng hi a na, khawsak tienga an insawn pei lai chun Sinar ramah phaizâwl an hmuh a; chutaka chun umhmun an khuor tah a.
“Thaw ro, ṭêklei siem ei tiu, ṭhatakin rawng ei tiu,” an inti tâwl a. Chuongchun, lung aiah ṭêklei chu an siem a, lungchârna aiah lawnghnai an nei bawk a.
Chun, “Thaw ro, khawpui siem ei ta, in insâng a sîpin vân tawng dingin bâwl bawk ei tiu a, ei hming sukthang ei tiu; chuong naw chun hnuoi chung po poa hin sukdarin um rawi ei tih,” an in tih a.
Chun, LALPA chu mihriem nauhaiin khawpui le in insâng an siem vêl chu en dingin a zu ṭum a.

Chun, LALPA chun, “Ngai ta u, mihai hi pumkhat an nih a, an rêngin ṭawng hmunkhat an nei bawk sih a; hi thil an thaw phut a ni hi; tuhin chu an thilthaw tum hrim hrim hi khappêk ruol ni ta naw ni hai.
Thaw ro, zu fêng ei tiu a, ṭawng an inhriettuo thei nawna dingin khutaka khun an ṭawng zu suk- tumpêk ei tiu,” a ta.
Chuongchun, LALPAIN anni chu chutaka inthawk chun hnuoi chung po poa chun a sukdar tah a; chuongchun, an khaw siem khawm chu an tâwpsan tah a.
Chuleichun, a hming chu Babel an tih a; LALPAIN chutaka chun hnuoia mi po po ṭawng chu a suktumpêk ta leiin: chutaka inthawk chun LALPAIN anni chu hnuoi chung po poa chun a sukdar ta bawk a.
Hienghai hi Sem thlahai chu an nih: Sem chu kum za mi a niin tui lêt hnung kum hni hnunga chun naupasal Arpaksad a nei a:
Chun, Arpaksad a nei hnung chun Sem chu kum za nga a la dam a, naunuhmei le naupasalhai a nei nâwk a.
Arpaksad chun kum sâwmthum le panga a niin naupasal Selah a nei a:
Selah a nei hnung chun Arpaksad chu kum za li le pathum a la dam a, naunuhmei le naupasalhai a nei nâwk a.
Selah chun kum sâwmthum a niin naupasal Eber a nei a:
Eber a nei hnung chun Selah chu kum za li le pathum a la dam a, naunuhmei le naupasalhai a nei nâwk a.
Eber chun kum sâwmthum le pali a niin naupasal Peleg a nei a:
Peleg a nei hnung chun Eber chu kum za li le sâwmthum a la dam a, naunuhmei le naupasalhai a nei nâwk a.
Peleg chun kum sâwmthum a niin naupasal Reu a nei a:
Reu a nei hnungin Peleg chu kum za hni le pakuo a la dam a, naunuhmei le naupasalhai a nei nâwk a.
Reu chun kum sâwmthum le pahni a niin naupasal Serug a nei a:
Serug a nei hnungin Reu chu kum za hni le pasari a la dam a, naunuhmei le naupasalhai a nei nâwk a.
Serug chun kum sâwmthum a niin naupasal Nahor a nei a:
Nahor a nei hnungin Serug chu kum za hni a la dam a, naunuhmei le naupasalhai a nei nâwk a.
Nahor chun kum sâwmhni le pakuo a niin naupasal Tera a nei a:
Tera a nei hnungin Nahor chu kum za khat le sâwm le pakuo a la dam a, naunuhmei le naupasalhai a nei nâwk a.
Chun, Tera chun kum sâwmsari a niin naupasal Abram, Nahor le Haran a nei a.
Chun, hienghai hi Tera thlahai chu an nih. Tera chun naupasal Abram, Nahor le Haran a nei a. Haran chun naupasal Lota a nei a.
Haran chu a piengna rama Kaldaihai khuo Urah, a pa Tera hmaa chun a thih a.
Chun, Abram le Nahor chun nuhmei an nei a; Abram nuhmei hming chu Sarai a na; Nahor nuhmei hming chu Milka le Iska pa Haran naunu Milka a nih.
Chun, Sarai chu a ching a, nau hrim a nei nawh a.

Tera chun a naupa Abram le, a naupa naupasal (Haran naupa) Lota le, a mo, a naupa Abram nuhmei Sarai chu a ṭhuoi a; Kanaana fe dingin Kaldaihai khuo Ura inthawk chun an suok tlâng tah a; nisienlakhawm, Haran an hung tlung a, chutaka chun umhmun an khuor tah a.
Tera dam sûng chu kum za hni le panga a nih; chun, Tera chu Harana chun a thi tah a.
